definition[1]: studying or dealing with a school subject at a difficult level
definition[2]: having reached a late point in time or development
example[5]: The disease was too far advanced to be treated.
definition[3]: using very modern technology and ideas
example[7]: Their equipment isn’t as advanced as ours.
definition[4]: very advanced, and working in a better but often more complicated way than other things
example[9]: As machines become more sophisticated, they become more likely to break down.

definition[6]: using the newest and most advanced features, ideas, and materials that are available

definition[8]: using the most modern ideas, equipment, and methods
